_comment: Organization/Project-specific JIRA configuration - Contains workflow policies and project settings
_jira_project_comment: Your JIRA project key (e.g., 'PROJ', 'MYAPP', 'ENG'). Required for ticket creation.

on_start._from_comment: TODO: Customize statuses that trigger transition when starting work
on_start._to_comment: TODO: Set the target status when starting work (e.g., 'In Progress'), or leave empty to prompt
on_start._prompt_comment: If true, prompts for status selection instead of auto-transitioning
on_start._on_fail_comment: Action on transition failure: 'warn' (show warning) or 'error' (stop execution)

on_complete._from_comment: TODO: Customize statuses that trigger transition when completing work
on_complete._to_comment: TODO: Set the target status when completing work (e.g., 'Review', 'Done'), or leave empty to prompt
on_complete._prompt_comment: If true, prompts for status selection instead of auto-transitioning

_transitions_comment: Organization workflow transition policies - defines when and how to transition tickets. See docs/05-jira-integration.md for details.
_parent_field_mapping_comment: Organization issue hierarchy policy - maps issue types to parent field names. Example: {'story': 'epic_link', 'task': 'epic_link', 'sub-task': 'parent'}

sync._status_comment: TODO: Customize which JIRA statuses to sync when running 'daf sync'
sync._required_fields_comment: Optional: Fields required for ticket creation (e.g., ['sprint', 'story_points', 'acceptance_criteria'])
sync._assignee_comment: Filter tickets by assignee: 'currentUser()' (only your tickets) | specific username | null (all tickets)

_status_grouping_field_comment: Optional: Field to group by in status dashboard (e.g., 'sprint', 'iteration', 'release')
_status_totals_field_comment: Optional: Field to sum for totals in status dashboard (e.g., 'points', 'story_points', 'effort')
